price: 26. « Quand nous étions autrefois parmi les nôtres, nous redoutions (le châtiment d’Allah).
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
